panels.content:
# Spark Dashboards

The following metrics related to the spark system, it contains

- The [spark][SparkLink] metrics which uses graphite as the sink
 
- The system metrics which gathering are achieved using [Sigar][SigarLink]

- Details spark dashboard can be accessed [here][DetailLink]

- Details spark system dashboard can be accessed [here][SystemLink]

[SparkLink]: http://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/monitoring.html#metrics "Spark metrics"
[SigarLink]: https://support.hyperic.com/display/SIGAR/Home "Sigar Home"
[DetailLink]: /dashboard/script/spark.js
[SystemLink]: /dashboard/script/spark-system.js
